text: The 1990–91 New Mexico Lobos men's basketball team represented the University of New Mexico as a member of the Western Athletic Conference. The Lobos were coached by head coach Dave Bliss and played their home games at the University Arena, also known as "The Pit", in Albuquerque, New Mexico. ==Roster== ==Schedule and results== |- !colspan=9 style=| Regular season |- !colspan=9 style=| WAC Tournament |- !colspan=9 style=| NCAA Tournament ==Awards and honors== *Luc Longley - Honorable mention AP All-American ==NBA Draft== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" style="" | Round || Pick || Player || NBA Club |- style="text-align:center;" bgcolor="" | 1 || 7 || Luc Longley || Minnesota Timberwolves |} ==References== Category:New Mexico Lobos men's basketball seasons New Mexico New Mexico Lobos Lobos
